body: So I'm kinda getting bored of playing so I thought I would do an AMA so ask anything you want! I will try to answer everything.
body_tagged: So I'm kinda getting bored of playing so I thought I would do an AMA so ask anything you want! I will try to answer everything.
title: AMA??

replies.body: Cupcakez or Nubcakez?
replies.body_tagged: Cupcakez or Nubcakez?

replies.body:
You chose your numbers to be in a specific array of numbers, like "99250." If you add 3 to the first 9, 7 to the second 9, -1 to the 2, 5 to the 5, and 0 to the 0....

What is your final sum?

1) What is your skin?
2) How did come up with your IGN?

replies.body:
@FrostedNubcakez Nubcakez!
@MidnightBeats 39?
@TheRomanTrident Sadly I can't eat tomatoes ;c
@FrostedCupcakez Nubberz - You and Luna  Nin Nin Peachy and Kammy.
@Tarheelkiwi
1) What is your skin? Evo made it. Petes skin with black hair :P
2) How did come up with your IGN? I can't really remember the real reason but I did use it as a password for a long time.
3) Do you believe kiwis can fly? Yes they always have.

replies.body:
@Snoweh
What was the last movie, TV show or book that made you cry or tear up? I don't watch a lot of T.V or movie so I don't really have one :C
Where's Waldo? Under mah bed.
If you could meet anyone, living or dead, who would you meet? Tomas Edison

@TheHoopsman
20 digits of Pi?  I would go more mental trying to do that .-.

@Atdit He is my homie like sunrise729 xD

@Theunknown77 Nope hope one day I get to see one...

@Musician
Cats or Dogs. Cats xD

@Shadow
Will you 1v1 me on Kohi for fun?  Sure but last few times didn't end well for me.
How are you? Good as always.
What's your favorite type of music? Classical Rock
Best Avi moment? Hard to pick one. I would say 2nd prestige kill farming with Boss_Turtle.
Best server friend? On the server I would say Snowcone and JKawsome on Skype . But I do have a lot of best friends c;
